\n<\N[1]>Huh...\.\. The desk is mostly bare except for this book.
There's a boy in my class...\.\. and really that's all he can be called.\.\. I don't think I've
ever seen a more growth stunted guy in all my life.\.\. His head doesn't even come up to my
He's clearly insecure about it too.\.\. It was hilarious just watching him try to stretch
his back in a vain attempt not to be overshadowed by most of the girls in the class!
And this entry is about me?!
Toying with Hiroshi has been amusing to say the least.\.\. The way he gets so animated and
furious when anyone messes with him.\.\. As if he were capable of harming the head on a
He's like a small kitten, where even his most ferocious attempts at intimidation are
quite frankly adorable.\.\. I'm not the only one who's taken to pushing him around just
to rouse some amusing reactions.\.\. Poor guy.
\n<\N[1]>Adorable?!\.\. When I go into a fit of rage
over her constant bullshit she thinks it's ADORABLE?
It's become a matter of course for me to bully Hiroshi.\.\. It's absolutely addicting.\.\.
Everytime I have to peer over my own chest just to stare down at him...\.\. I'm overcome
by feelings I can barely even understand.
A superiority complex?\.\. That seems to be the most likely thing.\.\. All I know is, I've
begun to earnestly look forward to ruining Hiroshi's day in any way I can think of.
\n<\N[1]>Yeah Maria.\.\. You have a superiority complex.\.\. Seems everyone realized that except for you.
So glad I get to be the primary fodder for you to enjoy yourself.
I wore the highest heel shoes I have today.\.\. I gave Hiroshi an exceptionally hard time.
I don't know why but the further I tower over him the more irresistible the feeling
Standing before me it wouldn't have been out of place for him to have a collar
around his neck drawn by a leash in my hand!\.\. The need to control him...\.\. To make him
mine...\.\. To bend him to my every whim...\.\. I just can't resist it.
\n<\N[1]>H-holy crap...\.\. This is getting more intense than I expected.
Hiroshi...\.\. Shrank to the size of a bug today.\.\. And it was that obnoxious bitch Natsuki's
experiments that did it to him too!\.\. It was everything I could do just to keep my
composure.\.\. As if towering over him normally wasn't good enough,\.\. now he was barely even
worthy of consideration to be my pet.
I was so overcome by the situation I didn't know what to do with him at his new size...\.\.\.\.
However I soon realized this was too indulgent.\.\. A waste of an incredible opportunity.\.\.
This development is exhilarating, and I cannot wait to explore all the possibilities...
\n<\N[1]>Just as I expected.\.\. You really let me live
just so I could become a toy for your amusement.
\n<\N[1]>Speak of the devil..!\.\. Thank fucking god she didn't see me here!
\n<\N[1]>...Damn.\.\. I...\.\. I always knew she loved to
torment me.\.\. That was always blatantly obvious.\.\. I had
no idea it went this deep.\.\. This is...\.\. obsessive.
\n<\N[1]>I need to finish looking around for that biometrics
chip and then figure out a way out of here.\.\. That box on
the other side of her bed looked very suspicious.\.\. I'll
have to cross over from here to check it out...
\n<\N[1]>A bed the size of multiple football fields...
